com.viaoa.annotation

Annotation Type OAClass


  • @Documented
@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OAClass
    Describes OAObject information.
    Author:
    vvia

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean addToCache
      flag to know if objects should be added to cache
      java.lang.String description 
      java.lang.String displayName 
      java.lang.String displayProperty 
      long estimatedTotal 
      java.lang.Class[] filterClasses 
      boolean initialize
      if false, then objects are not initialized on creation
      boolean isLookup 
      boolean isPreSelect 
      boolean localOnly
      if true, then changes are not sent to sever.
      java.lang.String[] rootTreePropertyPaths 
      java.lang.String shortName 
      java.lang.String sortProperty 
      boolean useDataSource
      flag used to determine if object can be stored to datasource.
      java.lang.String[] viewProperties
